original: Borgstedt, Bror Torsten, major, Eksjö, f. 17/5/90 i Ljungby av bankdir. Richard Gabriel B. o. Ina Ahlberg. G. 19 m. Ebba Jeanna Francke. Barn: Margareta f. 19, Curt 21, anst. v. Norska Amerika-Linjen, Märta 23. — Undilöjtn. v. Kalmar reg. 12, löjtn. 16, kapt. i armén 27, major i Jönköping-Kalmar reg. res. 39. Befälh. f. ro 19 i Värnamo 39-42, exp :off. i io 12 sed. 42. RSO, SkytteM.
translated: Borgstedt, Bror Torsten, Major, Eksjö, b. May 17th, 1890 in Ljungby, son of Bank Director Richard Gabriel B. and Ina Ahlberg. Married in 1919 to Ebba Jeanna Francke. Children: Margareta b. 1919, Curt b. 1921 employed by Norwegian America Line, Märta b. 1923. Formerly Second Lieutenant in the Kalmar Regiment, promoted to Lieutenant in 1916, Captain in the army in 1927, and Major in the Jönköping-Kalmar Regiment in the reserve in 1939. Commanding Officer of the Värnamo Rifle Battalion from 1939-1942 and retired as an Expeditionary Officer in 1942. Awarded the Order of the Sword and the Shooters' Medal.
